comment.author: 92284803@N00
comment._content: The men in the rear look like they could be playing Cribbage, but the front group have dominoes, not playing cards, accompanying their Cribbage board. A page about Domino Cribbage says that this form of Cribbage "first appeared in the Royal Air Force officer's clubs in England during World War II." This photo is from a few decades before that. Domino Cribbage: www.pagat.com/tile/wdom/cribbage.html
